title: Why is finance both science and art? - Quora

response.answer_text: Finance or financial accounting is both a science as well as an art because- It is said to be as an art as it identifies, records, classifies, summarises, analysis and interpretate the results of financial transactions. It is said to be as a science because it is based on different accounting concepts and conventions. Accounting concepts- 1- Going concern assumption 2- Consistency assumption 3- Accrual assumptions Accounting principles- 1- Business entity principles 2- Money measurement 3- Accounting period principle 4- Matching concept 5- Full disclosure principle 6- Materiality principles 7- Dual aspect 8-Revenue recognition 9- Verifiable objective concept

It can be called science because it follows certain rules of calculations and there are certain laws.For example:The financial statements are prepared in the same way using the same rules. But it isn't an exact science like physics. It needs some skills to optimise it's applications.For Example: investors should know that the markets are not entirely scientific. Investors like Warren Buffet use their abilities to gain wealth through investments. This make finance an art
